messages.subject: Jeva/trouble
messages.msgSnippet: All this trouble that Jeva has caused lately seems to stem from a judgement she formed almost immedietly about this list. This post was at another unschooling
messages.messageBody:
All this trouble that Jeva has caused lately seems to stem from a
judgement she formed almost immedietly about this list. This post was
at another unschooling list, the same DAY she joined this one. It's
too bad not a single post was stuff like the following...seems she
had an agenda here all along:


"I'm Jeva, 39, and I am an unschooling mother of 1 beautiful son who
was born at
home, unvacc. uncirc., who has been at home with me since birth, no
daycare
ever, attachment parented, family bedded, the whole shebang... lol!
and is now
9 years on the planet earth.

I am glad to have found you all and you appear to be a lot friendlier
than the
last list I just checked out and left. This list appears much more
serene with
fewer egos involved."

So quit posting here. HURRAY!! You found your internet home.

Ren
